0.9.name: wordpress/presswork
0.9.description: PressWork is a free, open source WordPress theme framework built for modern browsers using HTML5 and CSS3. Features include a drag & drop front-end editor for easy customization, the top 20 most popular Google Fonts and a responsive design using media queries so your site will look good on the iPad, iPhone and other handheld devices. Created by c.bavota and Brendan Sera-Shriar.
